rec.high_death_rate: Your death rate ({{rate}}/fight) is above the ideal threshold (<0.3). Review boss mechanics and improve positioning.
rec.good_survival: Great survival! Your death rate ({{rate}}/fight) is very low.
rec.high_damage_boss: You take significantly more damage on {{boss}} ({{dtps}} DTPS) compared to your average ({{avgDtps}} DTPS).
rec.improving_survival: Your survival is improving! Deaths decreased by {{change}}% in recent weeks.
rec.worsening_survival: Your death rate has increased by {{change}}% recently. Review what's causing extra deaths.
rec.low_health_potion: You use health potions in only {{rate}}% of fights. Aim for >50% to improve survival.
rec.no_healthstone: You use healthstones in only {{rate}}% of fights. They're free healing — use them more!
rec.low_combat_potion: Combat potion usage is at {{rate}}%. Using potions in >70% of fights significantly boosts your output.
rec.low_flask: Your flask uptime is {{uptime}}%. Keep it above 90% for consistent performance.
rec.no_food: Food buff active in only {{rate}}% of fights. Always eat before pulls!
rec.good_consumables: Excellent consumable usage! You're well-prepared for every fight.
rec.dps_improving: Your DPS has improved by {{change}}% in recent weeks. Keep it up!
rec.dps_declining: Your DPS has decreased by {{change}}% recently. Check for gear, rotation, or mechanics issues.
rec.below_raid_median: Your DPS is at {{pct}}% of the raid median. Focus on your rotation and uptime.
rec.above_raid_median: Great performance! Your DPS is {{pct}}% above the raid median.
rec.inconsistent_dps: Your DPS varies by {{variance}}% across bosses. Some encounters may need specific optimization.
rec.insufficient_data: Only {{fights}} fight(s) analyzed so far. Results will be more accurate with more data.
rec.moderate_death_rate: Your death rate ({{rate}}/fight) is moderate. Small positioning improvements can help.
rec.dps_stagnating: Your DPS has been flat ({{change}}% change) over the last {{weeks}} weeks. Consider reviewing your rotation or trying new strategies.
rec.weakest_boss: Your weakest boss is {{weakBoss}} ({{weakDifficulty}}) at {{weakDpsVsMedian}}% vs median, while {{strongBoss}} is at {{strongDpsVsMedian}}%. Closing this {{gap}}% gap is your biggest opportunity.
rec.deadliest_boss: {{boss}} ({{difficulty}}) is your deadliest encounter with a {{deathRate}} death rate over {{fights}} fights. Focus on learning that fight's mechanics.
rec.good_consistency: Great consistency! Your DPS only varies {{variance}}% across bosses.
rec.good_dispels: Excellent dispel performance! You average {{avg}} dispels per fight.
rec.low_interrupts: You average only {{avg}} interrupts per fight. Try to interrupt more when possible.
rec.good_interrupts: Great utility! You average {{avg}} interrupts per fight.
rec.low_active_time: Your active time is only {{pct}}%. Aim for >85% — every second not casting is lost DPS.
rec.good_active_time: Excellent uptime! {{pct}}% active time means you're always casting.
rec.low_cpm: Your CPM ({{cpm}}) is low. Try to minimize downtime between casts and reduce unnecessary movement.
rec.good_cpm: Great rotation flow! {{cpm}} casts per minute shows solid execution.
rec.low_parse: Your average parse is {{pct}}% — you're in the bottom quartile globally. Focus on rotation fundamentals and uptime.
rec.below_avg_parse: Your average parse ({{pct}}%) is below the global median. Small rotation and uptime improvements can push you higher.
rec.high_parse: Impressive! Your average parse of {{pct}}% puts you well above most players globally.
rec.mplus_dungeon_gap: Your weakest dungeon is {{dungeon}} (+{{level}}) while your best is +{{bestLevel}}. Running {{dungeon}} more will boost your score significantly.
rec.mplus_untimed_runs: You have {{count}} untimed key(s) in your best runs ({{dungeons}}). Retime these at the same level for easy score gains.
rec.mplus_timing_tight: Your {{dungeon}} (+{{level}}) clear was tight ({{pct}}% of par time). Consider route optimization or bigger pulls.
rec.mplus_all_timed: All {{count}} best runs are timed! You're ready to push the next key level.
rec.mplus_push_target: Based on your profile, {{dungeon}} is your best candidate to push from +{{current}} to +{{target}}.
rec.mplus_score_bracket: Your score ({{score}}) is in the {{bracket}} range. Next milestone: {{nextBracket}} at {{nextScore}}.
rec.mplus_role_score_gap: Your {{role}} score ({{roleScore}}) is much lower than your main role ({{mainScore}}). Off-spec keys could boost total score.
rec.mplus_low_score: Your M+ score is {{score}}. Focus on timing keys at your current level rather than pushing higher.
